attributes.action: give immediate right to live in the UK to Tul Bahadur Pun VC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Tul Bahadur Pun has been denied the right to live in the UK and was told "You have failed to demonstrate that you have strong ties with the UK." despite winning the Victoria Cross whilst serving in the British Army.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
